item.title: Setting up for success
item.description: Setting up for success Have something that only gets done during treatments. Rotate a few things often. Get a good organization system. Make it a convenient location. Ideas for cabinets that fit vests and medication. If the sky's the limit, do a custom built-in. Make the space cozy. Good lighting. Sensory Table with understorage – ikea table with orbeez or water beads in it. Something contained but fun. Little legos inside those bins with a surface to build on would be excellent.
